Crown of the Fire King

crown (lvl 8 - unique)

heataura [heataura]: 3
batstartsum2 [batstartsum2]: #596 Fire Elemental x 2
(unremovable [cursed], crown [crown])

Requires 25F to forge (F4)

This crown has an ancient, powerful fire being trapped in its rubies. Anyone putting on the crown will soon become influenced by the fire being and claim the crown as his forever. The wearer of the crown will radiate severe heat and will also be protected by two fire elementals whenever he is threatened.
